QueryResult.text: ( SELECT ID, SUBJECT, DESCRIPTION, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_TYPE_NAME, LANGUAGE_CODE, OBJECT_ID, PROCESS_HANDLER_ID, MULTIPLE_ASSIGNEE, DUE_DATE, IS_RECURRING, PRIORITY_CODE, ASSIGNED_USER_ID, OWNER_ID, OWNER_FIRST_NAME, OWNER_LAST_NAME, OWNER_USER_NAME, ASSIGNEE_ID, ASSIGNED_USER_ID, ASSIGNEE_FIRST_NAME, ASSIGNEE_LAST_NAME, STATUS_CODE, IS_PROXY, IS_ESCALATED, SUB_OBJECT_ID, SUB_OBJECT_TYPE, AI_DEF_TYPE, AI_DEF_ID FROM CAL_ACTION_ITEMS_ASSIGNED_V ASSIGNEES UNION SELECT ID, SUBJECT, DESCRIPTION, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_TYPE_NAME, LANGUAGE_CODE, OBJECT_ID, PROCESS_HANDLER_ID, MULTIPLE_ASSIGNEE, DUE_DATE, IS_RECURRING, PRIORITY_CODE, OWNER_ID, OWNER_ID, OWNER_FIRST_NAME, OWNER_LAST_NAME, OWNER_USER_NAME, ASSIGNEE_ID, ASSIGNED_USER_ID, ASSIGNEE_FIRST_NAME, ASSIGNEE_LAST_NAME, STATUS_CODE, IS_PROXY, IS_ESCALATED, SUB_OBJECT_ID, SUB_OBJECT_TYPE, AI_DEF_TYPE, AI_DEF_ID FROM CAL_ACTION_ITEMS_OWNED_V AITEMS )
